data.name: Standard For Product Model Data (*.stp. *.step)
data.detailed_description:
This DLC extends CUR3D Steam Edition with the following import file format:
Product Model Data (*.stp, *.step)
data.about_the_game:
This DLC extends CUR3D Steam Edition with the following import file format:
Product Model Data (*.stp, *.step)
data.short_description: This DLC extends CUR3D Steam Edition with the following import file format: Product Model Data (*.stp, *.step)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7*
  • Processor: 64 bit system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX* 11 graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires an internet connection; for copy protection.
